type.name: T:Elysium.Notifications.Animation
type.summary: Defines an animation of notification's appearing and fading.

field.name: F:Elysium.Notifications.Animation.Fade
field.summary: A notification changes it's transparency from 0% to 100%.

field.name: F:Elysium.Notifications.Animation.Slide
field.summary: A notification gradualyy appears from the specified side of the screen.
